summary: Iteration 9 - WebSocket Real-time Updates Testing. All features working correctly. Dashboard shows OCPP Live Status widget with WebSocket connection indicator. OCPP page shows 'Live Updates Active' badge and 4 status cards. WebSocket endpoint /api/ocpp/ws responds correctly to connections.
passed_tests: Dashboard shows OCPP Live Status widget
Dashboard OCPP widget shows 'Connected' WebSocket status badge
Dashboard OCPP widget shows 'Online Chargers' metric
Dashboard OCPP widget shows 'Active Sessions' metric
Dashboard OCPP widget shows 'Charging Now' metric
OCPP page shows 'Live Updates Active' badge with pulsing indicator
OCPP page shows 'Active Transactions' status card
OCPP page shows 'Online Chargers' status card with WebSocket label
OCPP page shows 'Boot Notifications' status card
OCPP page shows 'Total Chargers' status card
WebSocket responds to 'status' command with charger data
Real-time charger count updates via WebSocket
critical_code_review_comments: WebSocket connection shows brief 1006 close codes during initial connection attempts - this is normal behavior as the hook tries to establish connection
Auto-reconnect mechanism works correctly with 3-second delay
context_for_next_testing_agent: WebSocket real-time updates feature is fully functional. The useOCPPWebSocket hook manages WebSocket connection with auto-reconnect (3-second delay). Dashboard shows OCPPLiveStatus component with connection status, online chargers, active sessions, and charging now metrics. OCPP page shows 'Live Updates Active' badge and 4 status cards. WebSocket endpoint at /api/ocpp/ws responds to 'status' and 'ping' commands.

websocket_features_tested.hook: useOCPPWebSocket.js - Custom React hook with auto-reconnect
websocket_features_tested.dashboard_widget: OCPPLiveStatus.js - Shows connection status, online chargers, active sessions, charging now
websocket_features_tested.ocpp_page: OCPP.js - Shows 'Live Updates Active' badge, 4 status cards, live event notifications
